verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani , the lead attorney for President Donald Trump ,] [V: asserted] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump could pardon himself if he is indicted by special counsel Robert Mueller] .
